reviews.review: Отличная игра всем рекомендую!

If you love slasher movies, this game is right for you. The game is worth the money, the graphics are amazing and the DLC make the game even better.

the Halloween DLC is my favourite since Halloween is one of my favourite Slasher Flicks around, and I'm so happy that the Developers decided to make a Halloween DLC. 

The only issues that I come across is the lobbies waiting time since it takes forever to get into a lobby and players campaing around the meat hooks. The game is kinda buggy and the developers don't really listen to their fans which these make the game kinda annoying :(. 

Other than these issues I think this game is really fun, the gameplay is absolutely amazing and scary, also I love the cartoon graphics on the game, I do recommend it :) since I enjoy the game a lot but it's up to you :) if you want to buy it :).
ruim
进游戏弹出EAC怎么搞 进网吧就是这个问题

This game has been one of my favorite games for a very long time and i'v been sticking with this game for 5 years, hoping that with every update they might actually make a good change. With this update though, i think its clear that its not gonna happen. 

This game can be fun and addicting but now i don't even see myself having fun at all. The new animations just don't feel right and the new UI has made playing both sides headache inducing, plus they have completely changed the system so that means we are stuck with this new HUD, you could say "just get used to it" but like i feel its unnecessary to have to look in 4-5 different locations. These devs are some of the laziest and incompetent and will not listen to their community. It has taken them years just to remove or change very minor things along with the fact that there are bugs that have been in the game for years as well. 

I don't understand why they keep adding stuff that LITERALLY no one asked for, but the devs don't care cause they can get away with it since theres no other competing game.

แก้ไขการเล่นผู้รอดชีวิตหน่อย กดเข้าห้องแล้วค้างบ่อยมาก แต่พอเล่นฆาตกรปกติดี
It's fun to play with friends...

This game is a very clever concept but poorly, no, terribly executed.

The concept of 4 v 1 Survivors vs Killer is a great idea, "Murder Tag"...except...

-Matching 4 rank 1 Survivors with 16 perks among them against a killer who is rank 20 with no perks is laughably unfair.
-Allowing 4 Survivors to sabotage all the hooks the instant they enter the game so the killer CAN'T get any kills is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors endless self healing and teammate healing after being slashed to the ground over and over is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors to "See" where the killer is with various perks while the Killer is blind is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors to combine perks so that just 1 Survivor is now stronger than the Killer is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors to rocket boost forward after getting hit, then a perk gives them 150% run speed to escape is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors to endlessly juke and window juke the Killer is unfair.
-Allowing Survivors to instantly escape the Killer after he has done all the work to catch them is unfair. (Add this together, Instant escape + 5 second stun for the Killer + Boosted run speed for the Survivor compared to all the effort the Killer had to go through just to catch them, undone with 1 perk)
-Allowing Survivors into ranked public games with VOIP chat is ludicrously unfair, it is actually a form of cheating because of the collusion and collaboration that takes place further increasing the difficulty for the Killer in a game that is already too difficult for the Killer. Having a Survivor who gets hooked call out, "He's heading behind the building, come get me!!!" is cheating.
-Allowing Survivors to detect and sabotage a Trapper's traps thus negating an entire Killer character is grossly unfair.

...just to name a few problems with the game.

The entire burden of the game lies with the player who chooses the Killer because, without a Killer, not 1 Survivor can play this entire game. The game requires 1 person to choose a Killer in order for the game to even be played at all seeing as how there is no single player, no training missions, no story segments involving the various characters and their motivations, nothing, just online multiplayer. With the burden of the entire game on the shoulders of the Killer, why are the developers listening to Survivors who are whining and complaining about Killers being too strong? 
If a headless chicken wanders into a trap that a skillful Killer lays for them why is it the Killer who is instantly labelled a "filthy camper"? Would you refer to our Nation's military as "Filthy Campers" for using an entire field of science known as "Tactics", which is the art and science of the detailed direction and control of movement or manoeuvre of forces in battle to achieve an aim or task? The Survivors who complain to the developers are those who do not look both ways before crossing the street, then want someone to nerf the car that hit them because, "Woah, cars is OP yo!"
With the entire burden of the game resting on the Killer why are the Killer's methods to achieve his score raised as "Unbalanced game mechanics"?
If a Killer stalks a piece of screaming meat he has just hung up to di...dry, then why should it be called "Camping" by the people who got caught in the first place? Many Killers are forced to resort to watching their prey dangle on the end of a fishhook because of many issues, including the ones listed above, which necessitate the Killer ensuring they get at least some points for their effort while Survivors can get points for EVERYTHING including taking points away from the Killer. Survivors don't have to run into the Killer watching a hook, then whine about getting caught, there are other things in the game they could be doing.

Then, if I choose to play as a Killer and, in spite of all these problems, actually manage to kill all the Survivors I am treated to a torrent of unfiltered abuse from the angry Survivors complaining about me being OP with my rank 20 and no perks, while my mouse cursor disappears disabling me from being able to leave or exit the end screen. Another over looked bug, or inherent developer design to harass a Killer who uses his brain to play?

Then I read that the Test Servers are running Regenerating Hooks, Infinite Hooks, Killers able to sabotage generators, blahbityblah, etc.? This is insane...
This is actually CAUSING the game to veer completely away from it's core premise: Killer stalking players struggling to survive.

-Regenerating Hooks? 
Why have them be able to be sabotaged in the first place? Aren't they etherial connections to the Entity, disappearing after it has harvested the sacrifice? If not then why aren't they reusable? Hooks should NOT be able to be sabotaged with a lopsided basement map design (The Basement often spawns near 1 far corner of the map allowing Survivors to infinitely stall until the gates are opened thus forcing many Killers to not play the game but sit and watch their crawling victim so they can get at least some points. Can't pick them up, they have Decisive Strike! Thus causing what happens at the hooks to happen at the Survivor's location as well.) Allowing the hooks to be sabotaged is like playing a game of baseball, but one that isn't dependant on skill, but rather revolves around one team sneaking onto the field and destroying the bases so the other team physically CAN'T win. Who would play that game? Exactly. There are many baseball teams who don't win at all and you don't hear them crying and whining that the rules should be changed so they don't have to feel humiliated by another team who has conditioning, athleticism, tactical reasoning and execution, decernment, and talent who defeats them. They instead trade away bad players and look for new players who have something called Skill.

-Infinite hook time? 
Now players who are hooked can stall out the entire game by hanging on a hook, taking away any possibility of the Killer getting a reward for putting them up there. Aren't the hooks supposed to be painful, slicing through flesh and bone while the victim bleeds out? Who gets hooked and suffers no pain? The people on the Test Server that's who! The Test Server, a magical place where Survivors have no consequences, they can win or stall every match and the Killer is only there to host the game for the Survivors to play while laughing at his assumed lack of skill and nerfed gameplay mechanics while jeering, "Git gud noob!" In any competitive arena, anywhere in life, when people go head to head one side will always lose and one side will always win, this is how competition works. Instead of screaming their faces off for the rules to change, or the winners to be nerfed it is traditionally the "Losers" who are clearly seen as inferior. In the case of this game, it is not a skilled Killer who needs to be nerfed but rather, it is the Survivors without the proper inherent skill and capability who need to heed their own words and indeed "Git gud!"

-Killers able to sabotage generators? This is detracting from the core gameplay. This is causing the Killer to do something other than hunt Survivors. It's like playing a game of chess but before you can move you need to play a game of musical chairs first. No. The Killer's core job is to, anyone, anyone? Bueller? "Kill"! That's right! And it is the job of the Survivors to "Survive"! Killers hunt Survivors while Survivors try to orchestrate their escape and evade the Killer. It is NOT the Survivors' job to prevent the Killer from "Killing", and it is NOT the Killer's job to get a mechanical degree...come on.

If the developers continue to listen to these "Survivors" who want to play a competitive multiplayer game with no consequences for their actions, or lack thereof, with their opponent being outnumbered, his hands tied, his methods restricted, his mechanics nerfed then this game will truly be the only thing "Dead by Daylight".

처음 이걸 샀을때가 친구들과 다함께 즐길수 있는 게임을 하자는 이유에서였다 확실히 처음할때는 그 긴장감과 공포는 이루 말할수없었다. 커져가는 심장소리에 맞춰 손이 떨려왔고 갈고리에 쇄골이 관통하는 모습에 난 쇄골을 만졌었다. 이런 몰입감에 게임을 좀 더 진지하게 만들었다. 문제는 맵은 많지만 뭔가 아쉬운 적은 컨텐츠이다. 단순히 말해서 숨박꼭질밖에 없다. 굵게짧게 하는 게임이다. 만약 당신이 폐인짓할 게임을 찾는다면 이게임은 금새 질려버리고 말것이다. 허나 친구들과 4명 파티지어 생존자 플레이한다면 그것은 그것나름대로의 큰 재미를 느끼게 될것이다.

Игра,"где один игрок берет на себя роль жестокого убийцы, а четыре других игрока являются выжившими."
Пахнет враньём, лапшой, аферой, липой, подделкой, ложью, мошенничеством и туфтой.
На самом деле, эта игра о четырёх школьниках пубертатного возраста, которые троллят престарелых дедов и бабок в виде маньяков: светят им в их уже плачущие глазки, бегают вокруг досочек, мансят в тракторах, эскаваторах, комбайнах и просто делают на ровном месте развороты на 360 градусов или на два Пи в гр♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ых радианах, попутно делая приседы-полуприседы, видимо, тренируя основные движения для посадки на горлышко стеклянной или пластиковой бутылки. Когда же киллеру удаётся поймать одного из них, школьники начнут светить ему в моську, если не удастся его ослепить, то начнут блочить его своими тельцами, снова делая приседы, по той же причине. Неподготовленный маньяк слетит с катушек от возгарания жопного отверстия и выйдет из игры. Но если маньяк не из робкого десятка и накажет всех школьников, они посчитают своим долгом написать ему в комментарии профиля: " -REP КЕМПЕР, ГНИДА, МАМУ ЗАМУШ ВАДИЛ." Прелестно... и.. кстати, разрабы немного рукожопы, не могут починить баги, зато длс клепают, как электроник артс.

Вы внезапно оказываетесь в незнакомой местности, вокруг вас куча крюков, карканье ворон, крики людей и постоянное чувство, что за тобой следят... Ты заводишь генератор, руки дрожат, но вдруг кого-то повесили на крюк, он кричит как резаный и тут наступает час выбора: "спасти или нет?", пока ты размышлял, то успел облажаться с генератором! На твои маты кто-то идёт, начинается странная навясчивая музыка, кровь стынет в жилах, а ноги отказываются идти, ты увидел его лицо, искажённое так, как буд-то его перемололи через мясорубку, звук ломающихся костей и рвущейся плоти послышался издали, значит человека с крюка никто не снял... Он гонится за тобой, размахивая молотом, как обезумевший, после 2-х минут бега послышался спасительный звон готовых генераторов и открывающихся верей, твой товарищ открыл дверь и сбежал. Вот настал твой звёздный час! Ты перепрыгиваешь через окна, опракидываешь барикады, но не попадаешся под удар! В голове только одна мысль:"Спастись!!". Ты бежишь напрямую к воротам, цель так близка, что ты уже чувствуешь запах свежего воздуха, но тут позади послышалась бензопила, и когда ты обернулся, то ОН уже полоснул тебя по спине бензопилой... Ты ползёшь к выходу, раня рука и ломая пальцы, но всё бесполезно... ОН берёт тебя на плечё и несёт к себе в логово, уже нет сил сопротивляться, в глазах темно, словно ночью, а мысли сбиваются в один непрерывный поток... Мнгновение, и тебя вешают на крюк, ржавый и испачканый кровью прошлых жертв... Секунда... И когти сушьности разрывают тебя, вынимая и забирая твою душу... Добро пожаловать в Dead by Daylight...

Ich selbst war mir am Anfang nicht sicher ob ich mir dieses Spiel kaufen soll. Nun kann ich es aber anderen aus folgenden Gründen empfehlen:
-man erschreckt sich definitiv, aber auch Wut und (Schaden-)Freude erlebt man sehr oft
-jede Runde ist völlig anders
-man merkt nach ein paar Spielen relativ deutlich einen Fortschritt, wenn es um die eigene Leistung geht
-mit Freunden macht es viel spaß, aber man kann auch alleine interessante Runden haben
-ich finde das Spielkonzept ist sehr Innovativ
-mit 20 euro ist es relativ preiswert
-man wird zu keinem DLC kauf gezwungen 
-die Entwickler arbeiten konstant an diesem Spiel

Aufgrund dieser Gründe sind die folgenden Schwächen zu verkraften:
-Bugs (aber es wird immer wieder nachgepatched)
-Man sollte keine UltraHD Grafik erwarten, aber sie ist okay
-Wer nicht bereit ist (besonders am Anfang) auch mal 1 bis 2 Runden frustriert zu sein, aufgrund des praktisch nicht vorhandenes matchmakings, sollte sich den Kauf mal genauer Überlegen
(-die Runden sind stark von den Mit- und Gegenspieler abhängig)

Ich kann dieses Spiel aber trotz seiner Schwächen definitiv empfehlen, weil es mir nach fast 150 Stunden immer noch viel Spaß macht.

I don't write reviews often, but I felt this game really deserves one as it blows me away by how immersed I can get while playing it. Everytime I am actually on edge trying to stay fully alert when I play as a survivor, and have even screamed at one instance where one of the killers completely took me by surprise. First and only game to ever make me have a reaction like that - an instant favorite just at how into the game one can get.

Dead By Daylight has fun addicting gameplay with a nice leveling up system for your characters. Perks add variety to your abilities and each game is unique depending on your choices. This game got me back into multiplayer after giving up on shooters. I can happily play this game from my couch. Highly recommended game that is a great value.

Update: After some time my opinion still stands. This game is still a blast and keeps on getting better. That is why I nominated this game as "Labor of Love". There's no other game that lets you play as Michael Myers and Freddy Krueger in their respective line of duty.

If you like classic slasher movies and that kind of stuff I am sure you will enjoy this one. 

Dead by Daylight is really interesting game. Asymmetrical multiplayer in its core is really similar to Evolve. There is one killer and 4 survivors. Killer wants to slaughter these horny teenagers and survivors just try to escape. There is no way to kill the Killer so as a survivor you need to hide and work together to survive. Also it provides the horror element to this game making you feel helpless. This game provides 2 different gameplay experiences which are both equally enjoyable. It offers variety even if the gamemode is always the same. 

When you see people who have written reviews of this game, you can see that quite many have several hundred hours of playtime. That is because this game is addictive. There is not many maps to discover or interesting stories to find but what makes this game addictive is competition. I place this game in to the category of "Skill addiction". Much like many mobas and competetive shooters, this game has a steep learning curve and a ranking system. Getting better and unlocking new perks for your characters keeps you "hooked" and the gameplay experience fresh even when there is little variation. 

If you can look past some rough edges, bugs and salty adversaries, you will find very compelling and addictive multiplayer experience. 

8,5/10

上瘾的游戏，已经入了很久了，现在还在玩儿。是除了dota以外玩儿的最多的一个游戏。

Esse jogo é muito bom mano, super recomendavel

Not ready yet.

I really want to like and play this game.
But it has balancing problems (there is a leveling system that can give you an unfair advantage),
the main menu can only be used with the mouse(!)
and the main menu had a bug a minute ago that forced me to restart.

My recommendation: wait until those issues are fixed then go for it.

Игра про одиноких людей, которые яро хотят найти себе друзей. 
Игра про школьных задир которые подвешивают вас за трусы.
Игра про группу студентов, которые  всеми силами пытаются избежать встречи с изгоем группы.
虽然我玩这个游戏很辣椒但我发现这个游戏真的很好玩画质也很不错恐怖感还可以但无法忍受的是这里面的BUG多到无法忍受比如视角瞬移啊等等希望制作方能改善一下

Gioco molto bello ed intrigante, un 4vs1 veramente ben congegnato..un gioco FIEROH (cit.)
Unica pecca totalmente trascurabile se non conoscete l inglese e' il fatto che la chat finale e' normalmente un tripudio di noob,camper,kill yourselft ecc..ecc.. alla lunga stancano e non si possono ne filtrare ne segnalare (ammesso che i leoni da tastiera diano fastidio ovviamente, io li trovo irritanti al piu'). Giocare come Survivor richiede una certa dose di fortuna in quanrto se la scquadra fa scemate o si disconnette siete fregati ( c'e' la botola ma servono almeno 3 generartori), da killer preparatevi, se la squadra avversaria e' in comunicazione (premade) tutto risulter' un bel po piu complicato, altrimenti e' tutto un po piu semplice come ruolo
